data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 13405, Version Hash: 7255bb08b4b89ccbb57f00123f777c58532e9b5c
data.actual_result: It opens up the invite modal with an invite link that displays no invite code, and the friends list remains in a state of perpetual loading.
data.expected_result: It shouldn't be possible to open the invite modal
data.short_description: Even if there is no channels in a server, it still allows you to open the invite modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server and delete all channels and channel categories. - Use the "invite people" option to open the invite modal.
